name: Piranh.io
description:
The io game played by Youtubers such as Annoying Orange, Willyrex, Farod, Godenot and more! Dive in and battle online against other players in this fishtastic multiplayer io game!

Defeat everyone else and be the biggest piranha (or shark) in the tropical sea! Survive as long as possible and eat swimmers and smaller fish to grow. But remember: size is not everything in Piranh.io. Even the smallest piranha can defeat the biggest shark with POWERUPS! Use electricity to zap your enemies. Charge up the laser cannon, go ‘Pew pew pew’ and defeat everyone else!

It’s all possible in this real-time multiplayer io game!

FEATURES:
● Battle against other players in massive multiplayer online io game. Dive in, the water is warm!
● Offline game modes. Play against AI when you are offline!
● iPhone X and Haptics support!
● Livestream gameplay with ReplayKit Live!
● Lots of piranha and shark skins to choose from!
● Crazy battle with powerups like electricity, aquarium and laser cannon. Yes, there are sharks with frickin' laser beams attached to their heads!
● Two touchscreen optimised control methods. Virtual controls are included!
● Select your closest game server. Or let us pick the best one automatically!
● Game Center achievements and leaderboards included. Gotta complete them all!

"The overall game, however, plays much like Slither.io." - Ric Cowley, Pocket Gamer

Wi-Fi is highly recommended for the online game modes. Please pick the closest server for best experience. This game contains ads which can be removed with an In-App Purchase.
